testcase.name: Successfully create a new PIM
testcase.system-out: When I enter valid username and password....................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed And I navigate to the PIM creation page.....................................passed When I fill in the required fields with valid data..........................passed And I click on the Save button..............................................passed Then I should see a confirmation message "Success"..........................passed When I enter Employee Personal Information Management.......................passed And I enter Employee Contact Information Management.........................passed And I enter Employee Job Information........................................passed And I enter Qualification Information.......................................passed And the new PIM should be listed in the PIM management section..............passed
